sectionTwo.greetings: Hello, I am a German-speaking front-end developer based in Bad Nauheim. Driven by the limitless possibilities of IT, I look forward to designing visually appealing and intuitive websites and applications.
sectionTwo.location: I am flexible in terms of working environment and work effectively both on-site and remotely. However, being on-site is my preferred way of working.
sectionTwo.mindset: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to continuously improve my knowledge and skills.
sectionTwo.goal: In my profession, programming is not just about writing code; it is a creative form of problem solving. I am proud of my ability to transform complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. In this way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

sectionThree.tecText: My career path has taken me through various projects where I have applied a range of front-end technologies and concepts. I am open to new technologies and methods in order to continuously improve my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving world of web development.
sectionThree.contactMe: Please feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding my knowledge.
